title: Verndog
author: Verndog
content: Looking to buy peeled or funded Microsoul coins, lucky coins, silver coins, brass coins, bars, whatever you have got. Dig through your collection and let me know what you have.

comments.author: Spokanistan51
comments.body: I have some rare birdies, hit me up

comments.author: Verndog
comments.body: Thanks to those I’ve made deals with. Still looking.

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: 2014 0.01 bitcoin funded ms67 ANACS grade Autograph “gravitate” And also comes with new v2 hologram (rare one) If your interested pm me https://imgur.com/a/yxOa6IT

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: HouseOfBAMF on March 22, 2023, 02:20:13 AM2014 0.01 bitcoin funded ms67 ANACS grade Autograph “gravitate” And also comes with new v2 hologram (rare one) If your interested pm me https://imgur.com/a/yxOa6ITInteresting addition of the signature and hologram as those came from the Autograph Sets for the Encyclopedia of Physical BTC

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: this particular lot was bought on e bay from the maker of cryptofreeze…. I bought a long time ago before I knew about this form… I’m not sure if this broke up a signature/holo set when they were originally sold to me or if these were extras when people set up those EOPBTC signature sets… I would hate to think this actually broke up a complete set for the encyclopedia… but it could be the case….

comments.author: Verndog
comments.body: Ive made 4 deals so far. Thank you. Still looking.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: Verndog on March 16, 2023, 06:32:32 AMLooking to buy peeled or funded Microsoul coins,Quote from: Verndog on March 24, 2023, 10:53:38 PMIve made 4 deals so far. Thank you. Still looking.I still have a Microsooul coin, but I'm not sure it'd be useful to you... It's also a 2014 Microsoul 0.01 BTC Series-1, but it's peeled and ungraded ["it used to have ANACS MS 67 grading"]: PicturesNote: I'm not sure where you're currently residing but unfortunately, I can't ship to the US.

comments.author: Verndog
comments.body: Thank you for the response. I’m definitely interested but I do reside in the United States. If your situation changes and you can ever ship here, I’d be interested.
